includedAssets.title: Jurassic Park
includedAssets.synopsis: Breaking - and shaking - new ground with its monster special effects, Steven Spielberg's box office colossus brings Michael Crichton's bestseller to breathtakingly convincing life. Richard Attenborough is the well-meaning billionaire who unveils an island theme park full of cloned dinosaurs to his two grandchildren and three disbelieving scientists (Sam Neill, Laura Dern and Jeff Goldblum). Which is all wonderful until a power cut sets the meat-eaters free...
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When genetically engineered dinosaurs break loose on a remote island, a group of experts are on the menu. Classic from Steven Spielberg.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Breaking - and shaking - new ground with its monster special effects, Steven Spielberg's box office colossus brings Michael Crichton's bestseller to breathtakingly convincing life. Richard Attenborough is the well-meaning billionaire who unveils an island theme park full of cloned dinosaurs to his two grandchildren and three disbelieving scientists (Sam Neill, Laura Dern and Jeff Goldblum). Which is all wonderful until a power cut sets the meat-eaters free...

includedAssets.title: The Lost World: Jurassic Park
includedAssets.synopsis: The prehistoric superstars are back, bigger and badder than ever as Steven Spielberg picks up what they didn't finish off in this rip-roaring, King Kong-style sequel. It seems there was a second island site, where dinosaurs were allowed to mix freely. Naturally, once a shady bio-engineering outfit gets wind of it, the dinos quickly get the upper hand... Jeff Goldblum returns as the maths genius trying to make sense of the chaos alongside his scientist girlfriend Julianne Moore... although Pete Postlethwaite is in no mood to support their scientific cause as a hard-headed hunter.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In this hit sequel to Jurassic Park, scientists discover a second dinosaur island which has been untouched - until now...
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The prehistoric superstars are back, bigger and badder than ever as Steven Spielberg picks up what they didn't finish off in this rip-roaring, King Kong-style sequel. It seems there was a second island site, where dinosaurs were allowed to mix freely. Naturally, once a shady bio-engineering outfit gets wind of it, the dinos quickly get the upper hand... Jeff Goldblum returns as the maths genius trying to make sense of the chaos alongside his scientist girlfriend Julianne Moore... although Pete Postlethwaite is in no mood to support their scientific cause as a hard-headed hunter.

includedAssets.title: Jurassic Park III
includedAssets.synopsis: After two box office monsters from Steven Spielberg, director Joe 'Honey I Shrunk The Kids' Johnston takes the reins for the third trip to the island where dinosaurs rule and visitors are... dinner. It's a breathless ride, with Sam Neill's archaeologist Alan Grant returning to help a divorced couple (William H Macy and Tea Leoni) find their son, who's gone missing near the abandoned tropical theme park. Moving faster than a velociraptor on roller skates, the adventure sees the hapless humans facing prehistoric perils at every turn. Ptera-fyingly good fun.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Dino expert Sam Neill is hired by warring couple William H Macy and Tea Leoni to rescue their son from raptors. Steven Spielberg produces.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: After two box office monsters from Steven Spielberg, director Joe 'Honey I Shrunk The Kids' Johnston takes the reins for the third trip to the island where dinosaurs rule and visitors are... dinner. Moving faster than a velociraptor on roller skates, the adventure sees the hapless humans facing prehistoric perils at every turn. Ptera-fyingly good fun.

includedAssets.title: Jurassic World
includedAssets.synopsis: Smash-hit sequel to Steven Spielberg's classic 1993 creature feature, starring Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Smash-hit sequel to Steven Spielberg's classic 1993 creature feature, starring Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Smash-hit sequel to Steven Spielberg's classic 1993 creature feature, starring Chris Pratt, Bryce Dallas Howard and Vincent D'Onofrio.

includedAssets.title: Jurassic Park Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: When a breakthrough in genetic research opens up the possibility of recreating extinct species, businessman John Hammond builds a theme park of cloned dinosaurs, with disastrous results. Classic action-adventure franchise from director-producer Steven Spielberg, starring Sam Neill, Laura Dern, Jeff Goldblum, Richard Attenborough, Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: After a breakthrough in genetic science, a theme park of dinosaurs is built, with disastrous results. Hit franchise with Sam Neill and Chris Pratt.
